title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When saving a file using SaveAs function, the file is saved without specifying the file type or extension. The icon of the saved file changes from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The icon of the saved file should remain the same as the parent java file icon.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open a java file.
3. Click on the 'SaveAs' option.
4. Choose a location to save the file.
5. Observe that the file is saved without a file type or extension.
6. Observe that the icon of the saved file has changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
